duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide support communications related to billing and payment inquiries to establish and maintain positive client relationships.
Collaborate with multiple teams to ensure accurate order entry and address client issues in a timely manner.
Assist clients with billing inquiries, credit adjustments, misapplied payments, and authorized user updates.
Conduct order management and entry activities to complete service orders, and review client data to resolve concerns and inconsistencies.
Audit and update billing and client data to ensure synchronous databases for reporting.

education_certification.credential: Associate’s degree in business or a related field
